javadoc:
The PhaseProgressPanel provides a title, progress bar and message for the current phase that is 
 in progress

methods.javadoc: Determines and sets the preferred size of this panel.
methods.name: adjustPreferredSize
methods.comment: Determines and sets the preferred size of this panel.

methods.javadoc: Method to get the panel to update with changes when already on the screen.
methods.name: doValidate
methods.comment: Method to get the panel to update with changes when already on the screen.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the title line displayed by this panel.
@param newTitle the new title string
methods.name: setTitle
methods.comment: Sets the title line displayed by this panel.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the progress message within this panel.
@param newMessage the new message text to be displayed.
methods.name: doSetMessage
methods.comment: Sets the progress message within this panel.

params.name: newMessage
params.comment: the new message text to be displayed.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the progress message within this panel.
@param message the new message text to be displayed.
methods.name: setMessage
methods.comment: Sets the progress message within this panel.

params.name: message
params.comment: the new message text to be displayed.

methods.javadoc:
Fills in the progress bar to the indicated percent.
@param progressPercentage total percent of the progress bar that should be filled in.
methods.name: doSetProgress
methods.comment: Fills in the progress bar to the indicated percent.

params.name: progressPercentage
params.comment: total percent of the progress bar that should be filled in.

methods.javadoc:
Fills in the progress bar to the indicated percent.
@param progressPercentage total percent of the progress bar that should be filled in.
methods.name: setProgress
methods.comment: Fills in the progress bar to the indicated percent.

params.name: progressPercentage
params.comment: total percent of the progress bar that should be filled in.

methods.javadoc:
Removes the message from being displayed by this panel.
 Setting the message text will cause it to get added again.
methods.name: removeMessage
methods.comment:
Removes the message from being displayed by this panel.
 Setting the message text will cause it to get added again.

methods.javadoc:
Removes the progress bar from being displayed by this panel.
 Setting progress will cause it to get added again.
methods.name: removeProgress
methods.comment:
Removes the progress bar from being displayed by this panel.
 Setting progress will cause it to get added again.

name: PhaseProgressPanel
comment:
The PhaseProgressPanel provides a title, progress bar and message for the current phase that is 
 in progress
